LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Under_EltexTalisman.label: Miho Seal Talisman
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Under_EltexTalisman.descrip: A talisman made from Ebonsilk. Attaching it will make you more 'dog-like'. Note that it does not protect your buttocks.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Under_EltexOne.label: Miho Eltex Underwear
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Under_TribalEltex.label: Miho Tribe Eltex Underwear
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Under_Armor.label: Miho Protective Underwear
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Under_Armor.description: Shock-absorbing protective underwear made of Ebonsilk.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Under_Tribal.label: Miho Tribal Underwear
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Under_TribalTwo.label: Miho Tribal Underwear (B)
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Under_Industrial.label: Miho Underwear
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Under_IndustrialStripe.desc: Easy-to-make underwear. Good to wear in summer.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Under_IndustrialBlack.label: Miho Black Underwear
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Under_IndustrialBlack.descr: Easy-to-make underwear. Protects your weak legs from the cold.
